title: Hardware database compatibility
description: A schema for expressing devicetree-like compatibility strings.
The strings should be used by applications to match the
entity with entries or configuration in a hardware database.
Strings appear in the list from most specific to most general.
This allows an entity to express compatibility with a family of
similar devices, in turn allowing an application to match a
variety of devices with a single Compatible entry.
The recommended entry format is 'manufacturer,model' where
the manufacturer is a string describing the name of the
manufacturer and model specifies the model number.
